ol.li:
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( ) such that it
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169"
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.20 STATIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Participant2
Contains exactly one [1..1] @classCode with data type ActClassObservation
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @moodCode="EVN" Event (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.5.1001 HL7ActMood)
SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] code (CONF:10275)/@code="67519-9" Cardiac rhythm (CodeSystem: 2.16.840.1.113883.6.1 LOINC) (CONF:10274)

MAY contain zero or one [0..1] effectiveTime
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.01

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] value with data type CD (CONF:10278), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet CardiacRhythmReading 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.16 STATIC (CONF:10279)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.03

SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] methodCode (CONF:10277), where the @code SHALL be selected from ValueSet MethodOfECGInterpretation 2.16.840.1.113883.17.3.5.20 STATIC (CONF:10276)
NEMSIS Trace: EVitals.05

SHOULD contain zero or one [0..1] participant
Contains exactly one [1..1] CDA Participant2

body.codeblock: <observation xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.1133883.17.3.10.1.169"/> <id root="MDHT" extension="2123351656"/> <code code="67519-9" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Cardiac rhythm"/> <effectiveTime> <low value="2013"/> <high value="2013"/> </effectiveTime> <value xsi:type="CD" code="429719950"/> <methodCode codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC"/> <participant/> </observation>
